page.title: 16OUR AREA BLYTH
page.content: Broadway, Plessey Road, Rotary Way and South Beach are in the area we have looked at. On Broadway the houses are 45 to 50 years old. There is a lot of stained glass used in the windows. Originally Blyth was going to be a { {GARDEN TOWN}and we can see this in the many grassy areas and trees to be seen. The main trees are{SYCAMORE}and{ {LABURNAM. { }Croft Park Stadium is a{Football {Stadium.}Blyth Spartons play in the Amateur League. Ar Croft Park the schools are Victorian in style. This you can see by the windows in the schools. Rotary Way was built a few years ago. On that site there were fields and a bridge across the railway line.
